sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含有"变化，改变"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: change, alter, vary, convert, modify, transform, turn
means: change ： 指任何变化，完全改变，强调与原先的情况有明显的不同。
alter ： 常指轻微的改变，强调基本上保持原物、原状的情况下所进行的部分改变。
vary ： 暗示不规则或断断续续地变。
convert ： 指进行全部或局部改变以适应新的功能或用途。指信仰或态度时，强调较激烈、大的改变。
modify ： 强调起限定作用的变化或变更。指细小的变化，常含"缓和、降调"的意味。
transform ： 指人或物在形状、外观、形式、性质等方面发生的彻底变化，失去原状成为全新的东西。
turn ： 指外形、颜色、气味、性质等方面的变化，比change更通俗。

sentence.Network_en: Established practices are difficult to modify.
sentence.Network_cn: 既定的惯例是很难更改的.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French modifier, from Latin modificare, from modus (see mode)

entry.def: If you modify something, you change it slightly, usually in order to improve it.

example.ex: The club members did agree to modify their recruitment policy...
example.tran: 俱乐部成员的确同意修改吸纳新成员的政策。

example.ex: The plane was a modified version of the C-130.
example.tran: 这种飞机是C-130的改进机型。

entry.def: A word or group of words that modifies another word describes or classifies something, or restricts the meaning of the word.

example.ex: It is a rule of English that adjectives generally precede the noun they modify: we say 'a good cry', not 'a cry good'.
example.tran: 英语规定形容词通常放在其修饰的名词前：我们说 a good cry，不说 a cry good。

means.word_mean: 1. make less severe or harsh or extreme;

sentences.sentence: "please modify this letter to make it more polite"
"he modified his views on same-gender marriage"

means.word_mean: 2. add a modifier to a constituent
3. cause to change; make different; cause a transformation;

sentences.sentence: "The advent of the automobile may have altered the growth pattern of the city"
"The discussion has changed my thinking about the issue"

stems_affixes.word_buile: mod量度,方式,模式,风度+ern..方向的→最近式样
mod量度,方式,模式,风度+est→做事有规矩→礼貌的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 有节制的,中等的,适度的,温和的,稳健的
stems_affixes.word_buile: moder=mod量度,方式,模式,风度+ate……的→做事有分度→适度的
out出+mod量度,方式,模式,风度+ed……的→出了时髦[moded时髦的]→不时髦的
modest[adj.谦虚的,有节制的]+y状态→n.谦逊;端庄;羞怯

stems_affixes.value_cn: 模数, 模块, 登月舱, 指令舱
stems_affixes.word_buile: mod模式+ule小→n.模数, 模块, 登月舱, 指令舱
com共同+mod模式+ity表名词→有共同的模式物品→商品
mod量度,方式,模式,风度+ulate=ate表动词→对模式进行调整→调整

stems_affixes.value_cn: 向……提供住处;对……予以照顾性考虑;符合
stems_affixes.word_buile: ac加强+com共同+mod量度,方式,模式,风度+ate表动词→方式相同→符合
mod量度,方式,模式,风度+ify……化→规范化→修改
re再+mod量度,方式,模式,风度+el→再造模型→重建

Sentence.sentence: Some restaurants are modifying the recipes (菜谱) of British dishes to breathe new life into the classics, while others are using better quality ingredients but remaining true to British traditions and tastes.
As these decisions and agreements are made, we modify our behavior accordingly.
They argue that when a company like Monsanto goes to great expense to create a valuable new genetically modified seed, it must be able to protect its property interests
He used genetically modified seeds to feed his cattle.

sentences.en: The industrial revolution modified the whole structure of English society.
sentences.cn: 工业革命改变了整个英国社会的结构。

sentences.en: The heating system has recently been modified to make it more efficient.
sentences.cn: 暖气设备最近已进行了改造, 使其效率得到提高。

sentences.en: In “the black cat”the adjective “black” modifies the noun “cat”.
sentences.cn: 在the black cat这一词组中, 形容词black修饰名词cat。

sentences.en: The industrial revolution modified the whole structure of English society.

你最好缓和一下你的口气。

sentences.cn: 在“那只黑猫”中，形容词“黑的”修饰名词“猫”。

jushi.english: The industrial revolution modified the whole structure of English society.
jushi.chinese: 工业革命改变了整个英国社会的结构。

jushi.english: He will have to modify his views if he wants to be elected.
jushi.chinese: 他如果想当选,就得把观点变得温和些。

jushi.english: Those designs must be modified if they are to be used.
jushi.chinese: 如果他们要用的话,这些设计一定要改动。
